attributes.action: Please ban Ban Left 4 Dead 2 Violent Game
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This game is has horrendous violence and blood in it. I do not think our teens need to look let alone play theses types of games. 

This game in particular is banned from Australia and I am asking you to please stop it's release in the UK.

rejection.details: this is a matter for the BBFC, not Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
